title: New: Alice Jemima – Million Dollar Man (Lana Del Rey Cover)
body:
The world would be a much better place if it was illegal to record anything other than **Lana Del Rey** covers or remixes… or something like that.

Anyway, Devon songstress **Alice Jemima** has been on my radar for a few months now, however for some reason I never got round to actually writing about her music. With her latest outing, a cover of **LDR’s** _Million Dollar Man_, she showcases just how promising a talent she is. Gone are the lush orchestral sections, replaced by the fragile vocals of **Jemima** and sparse instrumentation, completing one of the finest covers you’ll hear this year. I think I’ve got a crush.

Check out _Million Dollar Man_ below, as well as recent single _All The Boyfriends_.
